data.title: City of El Centro
data.text:
Polar Express Family Night at the El Centro Library

Join us for fun with crafts, games, bingo, refreshments and music! Thursday, December 14, 2023 from 4:00pm to 6:00pm. Bring your letter to Santa and be ready to take a picture with him. El Centro Library, 1198 N. Imperial Ave, El Centro, CA, 760-337-4565. Polar...

City of El Centro Awards $39 million Construction Project for new Police Headquarters, to Break Ground Monday

The City of El Centro Council unanimously voted to award Barnhart-Reese the construction project of the new Police Department Headquarters during a Council meeting Tuesday. “We are excited to get this project started and start the process of constructing a new police...

Mayor’s State of the City Address

November 9, 2023, from 6:00 PM to 10:00 PM El Centro Library Community Room, 1198 North Imperial Ave, El Centro

City to Unveil First Responders Wall with 11 Honorees

The City of El Centro invites the public to attend its inaugural First Responders Wall Engravings Plaque Ceremony at 9 a.m. October 28 at First Responders Park, 1910 N. Waterman Avenue, in El Centro. The Wall memorializes first responders who have dedicated their...
